column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Jet says : " So , you guys got plans once you 're inside the city ? "
#Text=Tea seller says : " Get your hot tea here !
#Text=Jasmine please .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Blaugh !
#Text=Ugh , coldest tea in Ba Sing Se is more like it !
#Text=What a disgrace !
#Text=" Jet says : " Hey , can I talk to you for a second ?
#Text=" Jet says : " You and I have a much better chance of making it in the city if we stick together .
#Text=You want to join the Freedom Fighters ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Thanks , but I do n't think you want me in your gang .
#Text=" Jet says : " Come on , we made a great team looting that captain 's food .
#Text=Think of all the good we could do for these refugees .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I said no .
#Text=" Jet says : " Have it your way .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Hey !
#Text=" Zuko says : " What are you doing firebending your tea ?
#Text=For a wise , old man , that was a pretty stupid move !
#Text=" Iroh says : " I know you 're not supposed to cry over spilled tea , but ... it 's just so sad !
#Text="
